Class javachart.chart.HiLoCloseChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.HiLoCloseChart
public class HiLoCloseChart
extends Chart
Constructs a chart using Dates as X values, and High, Low, and Close observations for each Date.
See Also:
FinComboChart, HiLoClose

HiLoCloseChart()
constructs a default chart
HiLoCloseChart(String)
constructs a default chart with the specified name
HiLoCloseChart(String, Graphics)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class

drawGraph()
draws an entire chart to this chart's Graphic class
drawGraph(Graphics)
draws an entire chart to the specified Graphics class
